result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
result.translation: Unibuke ubwo abamalayika bavugaga bati “Yewe Mariyamu! Mu by’ukuri, Allah yaragutoranyije (ngo umugandukire), arakweza, anakurutisha abagore bo mu isi (mu gihe cyawe).”
